title: An Au Pair and a Millionaire
description: Lisa, a poor and naive Au Pair, has endured humiliation from her host family. She wants nothing more than to find a pen pal online so that she'll have someone to communicate with. But, she had no idea that her pen pal, Alexander, is harboring secrets. Secrets that will overwhelm her.Soon, they'll discover that their chance meeting will turn their worlds upside down.
author: Eva Goldsby
